author: Dominic-Stafford
body:
Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/8809 for use in Run2 production - requested by the Madgraph contacts so these packages can be accessed inside CMSSW in the event of hepforge downtime.

Tested with the Herwig+Madgraph matchbox workflow 539 backported in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43691
title: [10.6.X] Add Collier package and use ninja from gosamcontrib for madgraph
